recommendation: Very chilly today bb.  Pants for sure.  And I’d probably wear your winter jacket TBH!
You COULD get away with a sweatshirt, but I wouldn’t risk it.  Jacket it is!  Plus hat and gloves even!
Stay warm bb! You need pants, and at least a light jacket if not the full winter jacket
I love you so much!  Oh and to wear, you should probably go with a jacket or some layers!
